Arizona Winter School 2007 Application

STUDENT? If you are a student and would like to apply for funding to attend AWS 2007, and/or if you would like to apply to participate in a student project, please paste the following form into an email (or download the form), fill it out, and email it to aws2007@gmail.com. Don't forget to ask a faculty member for a letter of recommendation (item 11).

NOT A STUDENT? If you are not a student (or are a student but do not wish to apply for funding or to participate in a project) and you would like to register for AWS 2007 and, please paste the following form into an email, fill out questions (1)-(6) only, and email it to aws2007@gmail.com.
